'''Beta 1.4_01''' is a version of [[Java Edition Beta]] released on April 5, 2011,<ref>{{cite|url=https://mcupdate.tumblr.com/post/4361740378/minecraft-beta-1401|title=Minecraft Beta 1.4_01|website=MCUpdate, Tumblr|date=April 5, 2011}}</ref> which partially removed [[locked chest]]s and fixed a respawning issue with [[bed]]s.

== Changes ==
=== Blocks ===
'''[[File:Chest (S) JE1.png|32px]] [[Locked chest]]s'''
* No longer randomly generates on April 1st.
* Can now be broken like normal chests.
* Now "decay" like leaves.

== Fixes ==
'''1 bug fixed'''
* Beds now act as a respawn point as intended.
